args: Heeey! Mikoto! Did you find Mineuchi?
...No. There are 241 cats here,\nbut Mineuchi is not among them.
Thank you for helping me search,\nbut I expected this outcome.\nMineuchi is a truly singular entity.
He is a cat among cats: \nhis graceful figure looms black as night,\nwith omniscient eyes that watch the world.
In truth, I did not expect we would find\nhim, given that I have already been\npursuing him tirelessly for many years.
But even so, you still came\nhere to search for him.
Of course. I would follow any lead in\nmy quest to reunite with Mineuchi,\nno matter how outlandish.
I regret how things ended between us,\nand I vow to never let that happen again.
If that's how you feel, I'm certain you'll\nfind Mineuchi. And I'll keep helpingâ€”
This is one of the cats from the beach.\nIt remembers that I caught a fish for it.\nBut...why are you here, little one?
Is it trying to tell you something?
What?! Danger on the beach?!\nThen I must hurry!
Sheesh, the sun's already set.\nThis was supposed t' be an easy job...
Hey, c'mon, now! You make it sound like\nwe're the bad guys here! We's just tellin'\nYOU to hand over the cat, see?!
This is takin' too long, let's just grab\nthe thing.
Dammit, why the hell're THEY here?\nLet's hurry and get while the gettin's good!
The sea! We'll row outta here on\nthe boat and make a break for it!
It's curtains for us either way if those guys\ncatch up! C'mon, it's time to sink or swim!
Y-you got a point! With the seas this rough,\nthey won't be able to follow us, neither!
How DARE you try to drag a cat away\nagainst its will, you fiends!
Uh, is that a bow and arrow?
Fuhgeddaboutit! Ain't no way he's\nhittin' us with this wind!
You gotta be kiddin' me!\nHow the hell'd he land that shot?!
In attaining revelation, I have become as\nnature itself. I am human, I am the sea,\nand I am the wind as well.

The world undulates with nature's rhythm.
Life's flame fades according to the cycle of
providence. Your demise here is merely
another part of that cycle.
Q-quit it! I ain't got a clue what any of that\nmeans, and it's creepin' me out!
Within me resides the will of the heavens.\nIt demands justice for your deeds.\nNow, be silent and return to nature!
The cat escaped, but it got\nswept off by the current!
Wait! You can't do anything\nwith those wounds!
Stop, bro! It doesn't matter how good\nyou areâ€”paddlin' out into waves this\nrough is like signin' a death sentence!
*gasp* That wave! It's m-massive!\nIf Mikoto gets pulled under, he's...
